stories.text: We are a startup helping people to upskill or reskill to tech (software / IT). Is doing small freelancing projects through platforms such as Upwork / Fiverr a good way to gain hands-on experience before applying for full-time jobs?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Upwork or Fiverr a good platform for gaining professional experience?

stories.text: What free speech (repo) website anyone can put video and has feature to be able to play it immediately there, so like advanced public freedom-of-speech bulletin board
stories.title: Ask HN: What free speech site can put video, can play immediately there

stories.text: I keep finding histories of the OS version changes, but I'm more interested in the context of mobile OSes at the time before Android was created. I thought I had read a story from an Android founder's perspective. It detailed the context of how different manufacturers had their own OSs. It may have even included the context of the sale to Google. Thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: Help me find the origin story of Android
How Google got to rolling Linux releases for Desktops
